title: Service Quality Practical Competency Enhancement: Project-Based Social Education Linked to Textiles and Place

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in social studies education and understanding of educational laws
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can analyze local textile culture and design interdisciplinary lesson plans linked to social studies.
Preservice teachers can collaboratively produce three or more types of place-based learning materials through 5-member team projects.
Participants can build a smartphone-based digital portfolio and derive improvement strategies through peer assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
